name: Bombastic (Dustin Downs)
description: Bombastic is a top down action adventure game inspired by games like The Legend of Zelda and Minit, where your only tool is your bombs. You wake up in your small home to find your fridge wide open with all your eggs missing and a broken egg trail leading outside. Furious you won’t get your morning breakfast, you grab your bomb bag and head to the supermarket. You live far outside of town so it won’t be a quick stop to the shop. Along this journey you will explore various environments where you’ll solve puzzles, fight enemies, obtain items, and find secrets. And you may just find out where your precious protein went.
